casebody.data:
HILL
v.
HILL, et al. No. 638P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 22, 2005. W. Scott Jones, Asheville, for Garford Tony Hill et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of November 2005 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of November 2005."
